title: FPS spikes since updates
body:
Use to run on "Medium High" settings or some mixture of it just fine. No frame lag at all. Last week my Windows 10 and league updated, windows anniversary update + league 6.17

I've tried the DVR xbox fix, I've tried resetting Windows 10, running Windows updates for drivers... Anything that seems to work is short lived...

I get constant hiccups in FPS, drops from 60 to 20~ FPS, happens I noticed especially during a fight, spells + effects, and during announcements. Announcements I mean the announcer sound + the scrolling in the UI.

It seems so random, for example, I turned sound off, started a new game. Everything seems to be working _better_ but not as great as before. So I turn sound on during the game to test, and yes it was worse. So I turn it off again thinking it'll be better, and it made no difference. And I'm wondering do I have to just start a game with sound off and don't even try ticking it on and off or what...

Also turning my settings to "Very Low" aka blob mode, doesn't even matter. Like it's ridiculous it still spikes when League is this bad looking, lol. Compared to me being able to run on Medium High with no issues 2 weeks ago.

replies.body: Your windows update may have forced some of your drivers to go out of date, so as a first step I'd suggest checking those.  I appreciate all the troubleshooting you've done so far, and there's a few more things to try.  Go through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for some additional steps towards resolving this.  Also, if you have any apps that interact with league like play.tv remove it.  Let me know if you still have issues!

Hello, could you also deactivate Nvidia streaming services if you use it:
http://wccftech.com/nvidia-streaming-service-limits-performance-geforce-graphics-cards/

Same i am getting frames drops in every fight (started since the last patch 6.17)  and thats ruin my last game i tried to change the graphics to very low but still
nothing change so i changed the res from 1920x1080 to 1600x900 and the drops gone but still its stupid and riot should do a fix for this (btw i am playing on mac) :(({{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Hello mommys guy,

You could start by running the repair function located at the top right of the launcher,

It could also be worth a shot to try to manually find your graphics drivers and reinstall them.

* Just remember to download from either Nvidia/AMD/Intel drivers first (Usually the automatic tool will be able to find them.)
* Then uninstall the drivers through your device manager.
* Finally install the drivers you downloaded for your computer.
* Restart your computer.

One potential issue that could cause random fps spikes in Automatic backups as:

* When you spike down, the hard drive is busy having files read from it.
* When the fps goes back to normal, the files are then being organized onto the backup drive.

So make sure you don't have backups scheduled/running during your gaming.

You may want to open task manager and see what resources are being used up when the game is open (custom games for testing.)
